channel.title: Client freezes but can still type
channel.description:
Well, I've been editing a client, trying to fix the bugs and stuff but I've come to a block. When I try and get to my barrow chest thing the game screen gets stuck on loading - please wait but I can still type and read the messages.
What is causing this error and how could I go about fixing it?
(Also the mini map doesn't work in certain areas, how could I fix that?

item.title: Client freezes but can still type
item.dc:creator: @Xyger Xyger
item.description:
@Xyger wrote:

Never mind, I fixed it

item.title: Client freezes but can still type
item.dc:creator: @Xyger Xyger
item.description:
@Xyger wrote:

[code] case 9157://barrows tele to tunnels
if(c.dialogueAction == 1) {
int r = 4;
//int r = Misc.random(3);
switch® {
case 0:
c.getPA().movePlayer(3534, 9677, 0);
break;

					case 1:
						c.getPA().movePlayer(3534, 9712, 0);
						break;
					
					case 2:
						c.getPA().movePlayer(3568, 9712, 0);
						break;
					
					case 3:
						c.getPA().movePlayer(3568, 9677, 0);
						break;
					case 4:
						c.getPA().movePlayer(3551, 9694, 0);
						break; [/code]

No interfaces loading there :\
